title: 278: Katie’s Bachelorette Recap: Ep 6 (The Mass Exodus + The Ick + Is Greg the Puppet Master?)
itunes:title: 278: Katie’s Bachelorette Recap: Ep 6 (The Mass Exodus + The Ick + Is Greg the Puppet Master?)
description:
The Broads are here to cover the latest Bachelorette episode aka all the men were kicked off. They chat about the unfulfilled WOWO challenge, the full blown wedding ceremony that was Justin and Katie’s one-on-one, how Franco should be the new host, the goddess’ that are Shea Coulee and Monet X Change, how the men clearly don’t know how to “throw shade”, the continued attempted unionization against Hunter, their thoughts on why Greg may be the reason the men are unionizing, the ick and Connor’s final kiss, the hot hot chemistry that is Katie and Blake, and much more! 

 

VOTE FOR US FOR PEOPLE’S CHOICE PODCAST AWARDS!

Vote here for “Best Comedy Podcast” + “Best Female Hosted Podcast”: https://www.podcastawards.com/
